H0.text: According to legend, who was the father of King Arthur. Urian

H1.text: According to legend, who was the father of King Arthur. Gorlois

H2.text: According to legend, who was the father of King Arthur. Cerdic

H3.text: According to legend, who was the father of King Arthur. Ãœther

A4.text: Uther Pendragon was the father of King Arthur.

A5.text: Uther, disguised as his enemy Gorlois by Merlin's magic, sleeps with Gorlois's wife Igerna (Igraine) at Tintagel, and she conceives Arthur.
